long_description: Sram X.4 Trigger shifters set the standard for recreation-level shifting. They offer an intelligent blend of performance and value for mountain biking and pavement use. New ergonomic design features 2 levers, modeled after SRAM high-performance trigger shifters. Also features a new easy-to-read 8-speed gear indicator. 1:1(R) actuation ratio provides precise derailleur movement. Compatible with SRAM 1:1 rear derailleurs and SRAM or Shimano front derailleurs.
short_description: Sram X.4 Trigger shifters set the standard for recreation-level shifting. They offer an intelligent blend of performance and value for mountain biking and pavement use.
